titleStmt.title: SII 14.267: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 267. (A.R. No. 393 of 1917.) KĪḺAPPĀVŪR, TENKASI TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE WEST AND SOUTH WALLS OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE TIRUVĀLĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription commences with the praśasti of Tirumaḍandaiyum Jayamaḍan-daiyum, etc., of Jaṭāvarmaṉ Śrīvallabha and records the gift of land made tax free in Paṭṭamaṅgalam separated from Kuṟuṅgāṉam alias Teliṅgakulakāla-chaturvēdimaṅgalam to the god of the temple of Tirukkapālīśvaram in Pāgūr alias Kshatrīyaśikhāmaṇi-nallūr in Kuṟumaṟai-nāḍu. The king whose name and regnal year are lost is stated to have issued the order from the throne called Kaliṅgattaraiyaṉ in his palace at Madurai. The 55th day is however mentioned in the body. The gift land is stated to have been renamed as Sundarapāṇḍiyaṉ-viḷāgam.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṭantaiyum ceyamaṭantaiyum tiruppuyattu kaṉṉaṟāḷitiruppa yirunilam perumai Eyta Eṇṭicaiyuṅ kuṭainiḻaṟṟa maṉṉavarkaṉ vantiṟaiñca maravil varum muṭicūṭi teṉkumariyum vaṭakeṅkai tiraik kaṭalellai ṅkoluṭaṉ vaḷara maṉṉiya vira siṅhāsanattu Ulakamuḻutuṭaiyāroṭum māmutal matikkulam viḷaṅ
ku māṭakkuḷakkiḻ maturaikkoyilu Uḷālai Aḻakiya pāṇṭiyaṉ kūṭattup paḷḷippiṭaṅ kaliṅkattaraiyaṉileḻuntaruḷiyiruttu nāḷaimpattañciṉāl kuṟumaṟai nāṭṭup pākūrāṉa kṣattiriyāacikāmaṇinallūr UṭaiĀr tirukkavālicura muṭai ttukku Ikkoyilil tevakaṉmikaḷum cirimāyecurarkaḷum viṇṇappañceyya tiruvāḻa malarntaruḷiṉa
nitta ṉamantaṅkaḷukku Iṭṭa tevatāṉaṅ kuṟuṅkāṉamāṉ teliṅkkulakālac catuṟveti maṅkalattu teṉpāl piṟinta paṭṭamaṅkalattu nālveliyeṉṟu per kūvappaṭṭa nilattu peruṉāṉkellai yāvatu kiḻak kum teṟkellaivaṭaveḷḷaikālukku vaṭakkum meṟkellai Ikkālil Aṇaikkuk kiḻakkum
paṭṭa ṉilam Iṟai curukki paḻam per tavirttu Iṉṉāyaṉāṟku kārāṇmai meyyācci Aṉ������� Iṟaiyili tevatānamamākki cuntarapāṇṭiyaṉ viḷākam meṉṉum tirunāmattāl veṟumutalākki Ikkoyilil paḷḷikoṇṭāḷvārukku Inilat til Aiñcumāvum Iṟai I yili tevatāṉamāka maṟṟum Epperppaṭṭaṉavum tavirt=tu kuṭuttom Ippaṭikku kaliṅkarāyan Eḻuttu

app.note: The inscription is built in at this and the corresponding section of the other lines.

div.p: Digital edition of SII 14.267 (ARIE/1917-1918/B/1917/393) by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
